title: Philips Norelco Shaver 2300 Rechargeable Electric Shaver with PopUp Trimmer for male, Black, 1 Count, S1211/81
description: Philips Norelco Shaver 2300 gives you a consistent, convenient clean shave. Self-sharpening ComfortCut blades, a pop-up trimmer and full-washability make the shaver easy to use and excellent value.
